20110124073544.000|20110124073545.000|CC1|EDUCATION AND HEALTH CARE.

20110124073547.000|20110124073548.000|CC1|OF THE LEAGUE OF CALIFORNIA

20110124073554.000|20110124073556.000|CC1|ONE MORE THING TO WORRY ABOUT.  
20110124073556.000|20110124073559.000|CC1|THE U.S. GEOLOGICAL SURVEY SAID 
20110124073559.000|20110124073602.000|CC1|THE BIG ONE MAY NOT BE AN       
20110124073602.000|20110124073603.000|CC1|EARTHQUAKE, BUT A FLOOD.        
20110124073603.000|20110124073604.000|CC1|IT HAPPENED BEFORE.             
20110124073604.000|20110124073606.000|CC1|THREE WEEKS OF CONTINUOUS STORMS
20110124073606.000|20110124073608.000|CC1|DROPPING 10 FEET OF WATER?      
20110124073608.000|20110124073610.000|CC1|TODAY THAT WOULD RESULT IN AN   
20110124073610.000|20110124073613.000|CC1|ESTIMATED $300 BILLION IN DAMAGE
20110124073613.000|20110124073614.000|CC1|WE TALK TO LUCY JONES OF THE    
20110124073614.000|20110124073618.000|CC1|USGS.                           
20110124073618.000|20110124073619.000|CC1|>> CALIFORNIA.                  
20110124073619.000|20110124073624.000|CC1|IT RAINED FOR ALMOST 45 DAYS.   
20110124073624.000|20110124073627.000|CC1|FIERCE STORMS WITH A 300 MILE   
20110124073627.000|20110124073630.000|CC1|LENGTH OF THE SACRAMENTO AND SAN
20110124073630.000|20110124073631.000|CC1|JOAQUIN VALLEYS WITH WATER.     
20110124073631.000|20110124073633.000|CC1|IN SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA, THE     
20110124073633.000|20110124073634.000|CC1|FLOODING GROUNDED THOUSANDS OF  
20110124073634.000|20110124073637.000|CC1|CATTLE AND WASHED AWAY HOME,    
20110124073637.000|20110124073638.000|CC1|FOOD CROPS AND VINEYARDS.       
20110124073638.000|20110124073641.000|CC1|THE STATE IS BANK RUPT AND      
20110124073641.000|20110124073642.000|CC1|COMMUNITIES HAVE BEEN RUINED AND
20110124073642.000|20110124073644.000|CC1|WILL TAKE YEARS TO RECOVER.     
20110124073644.000|20110124073645.000|CC1|>> THIS VIDEO IS FROM THE       
20110124073645.000|20110124073649.000|CC1|FEDERAL GOVERNMENT ON A CALAMITY
20110124073649.000|20110124073650.000|CC1|THAT COULD BEFALL CALIFORNIA.   
20110124073650.000|20110124073653.000|CC1|FIRST A LOOK AT A TIME WHEN THE 
20110124073653.000|20110124073655.000|CC1|ECONOMY WAS SO BAD, EITHER THE

20110124073656.000|20110124073658.000|CC1|PAID FOR AMONT.                 
20110124073658.000|20110124073659.000|CC1|IT WAS BECAUSE OF A FLOOD THAT  
20110124073659.000|20110124073701.000|CC1|SCIENTISTS BELIEVE IS IN OUR    
20110124073701.000|20110124073701.000|CC1|FUTURE.                         
20110124073701.000|20110124073703.000|CC1|WE TALKED WITH ONE OF THE       
20110124073703.000|20110124073704.000|CC1|AUTHORS OF THE REPORT.          
20110124073704.000|20110124073706.000|CC1|WITH US IS LUCY JONES OF THE    
20110124073706.000|20110124073707.000|CC1|U.S. GEOLOGICAL SURVEY.         
20110124073707.000|20110124073709.000|CC1|>> GOOD TO BE HERE.             
20110124073709.000|20110124073711.000|CC1|>> WHEN DID WE START WORRYING   
20110124073711.000|20110124073713.000|CC1|ABOUT FLOOD SAYS AS MUCH AS WE  
20110124073713.000|20110124073713.000|CC1|DO EARTHQUAKES?                 
20110124073713.000|20110124073715.000|CC1|>> IF YOU LIVED IN CALIFORNIA   
20110124073715.000|20110124073718.000|CC1|FOR 150 YEARS, YOU WOULD HAVE   
20110124073718.000|20110124073720.000|CC1|KNOWN THAT FLOODS ARE           
20110124073720.000|20110124073722.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA'S OTHER BIG ONE.     
20110124073722.000|20110124073724.000|CC1|BUT BECAUSE THEY WERE SO BAD IN 
20110124073724.000|20110124073727.000|CC1|THE 19th CENTURY, WE BUILT A    
20110124073727.000|20110124073728.000|CC1|GREAT FLOOD CONTROL SYSTEM AND  
20110124073728.000|20110124073731.000|CC1|WE MANAGED TO REMOVE THE        
20110124073731.000|20110124073732.000|CC1|MODERATE FLOODS WITH A          
20110124073732.000|20110124073734.000|CC1|SIGNIFICANT FACTOR              
20110124073734.000|20110124073735.000|CC1|FOR MOST OF THE PEOPLE GROWING  
20110124073735.000|20110124073736.000|CC1|UP IN CALIFORNIA, WE DON'T THINK
20110124073736.000|20110124073739.000|CC1|OF FLOODS AS AN ISSUE.          
20110124073739.000|20110124073741.000|CC1|WHEN WE DID A STUDY AND COMPARED
20110124073741.000|20110124073742.000|CC1|THE TYPE OF FLOOD THAT HAPPENS  
20110124073742.000|20110124073745.000|CC1|EVERY 100 OR 200 YEARS WITH THE 
20110124073745.000|20110124073746.000|CC1|TYPE OF EARTHQUAKE THAT HAPPENS 
20110124073746.000|20110124073749.000|CC1|EVERY 100 OR 200 YEARS, WE END  
20110124073749.000|20110124073751.000|CC1|UP CONCLUDING THAT THE FLOOD    
20110124073751.000|20110124073753.000|CC1|COSTS FIVE TIMES AS MUCH.       
20110124073753.000|20110124073754.000|CC1|>> HOW IS THAT POSSIBLE?        
20110124073754.000|20110124073757.000|CC1|>> BECAUSE IT'S A STATE-WIDE    
20110124073757.000|20110124073757.000|CC1|EVENT.                          
20110124073757.000|20110124073800.000|CC1|EVEN THE BIGGEST EARTHQUAKES ARE
20110124073800.000|20110124073801.000|CC1|ONLY SOUTHERN OR NORTHERN       
20110124073801.000|20110124073802.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA.                     
20110124073802.000|20110124073804.000|CC1|EVERY COUNTY HAS DAMAGE.        
20110124073804.000|20110124073807.000|CC1|ONE QUARTER OF THE BUILDINGS OF 
20110124073807.000|20110124073808.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA HAVE FLOOD DAMAGE.   
20110124073808.000|20110124073812.000|CC1|EVERY COUNTY IS AFFECTED AND    
20110124073812.000|20110124073816.000|CC1|WITH THAT FLOODING EXTENT, IT'S 
20110124073816.000|20110124073818.000|CC1|ALMOST ALL FLOODING DAMAGE.     
20110124073818.000|20110124073820.000|CC1|OVER $300 BILLION OF DAMAGE TO  
20110124073820.000|20110124073822.000|CC1|THE HOUSES OR THE BUILDINGS.    
20110124073822.000|20110124073825.000|CC1|ANOTHER $600 BILLION IN BUSINESS
20110124073825.000|20110124073826.000|CC1|AND ERUPTION COSTS              
20110124073826.000|20110124073827.000|CC1|WE ESTIMATE THIS FLOOD LIKE THE 
20110124073827.000|20110124073834.000|CC1|1 THAT HAPPENED IN 1861, '62    
20110124073834.000|20110124073836.000|CC1|WOULD COST ABOUT $1 TRILLION.   
20110124073836.000|20110124073838.000|CC1|>> WHAT WERE THE CONSEQUENCES OF
20110124073838.000|20110124073839.000|CC1|THAT ONE?                       
20110124073839.000|20110124073841.000|CC1|>> THERE WEREN'T A LOT OF PEOPLE
20110124073841.000|20110124073843.000|CC1|HERE, BUT THERE WAS A LOST RAIN.
20110124073843.000|20110124073844.000|CC1|IT CREATED LAKES.               
20110124073844.000|20110124073847.000|CC1|THERE WAS A 300 MILE LONG LAKE  
20110124073847.000|20110124073848.000|CC1|IN THE SAN JOAQUIN VALLEY THAT  
20110124073848.000|20110124073852.000|CC1|AVERAGED ABOUT 20 MILES ACROSS. 
20110124073852.000|20110124073854.000|CC1|THEY SAID IT WAS WATER FROM     
20110124073854.000|20110124073855.000|CC1|MOUNTAIN TO MOUNTAIN.           
20110124073855.000|20110124073858.000|CC1|FROM THE SAN GIBB RILE TO PAL   
20110124073858.000|20110124073859.000|CC1|OWES VERDES.                    
20110124073859.000|20110124073904.000|CC1|>> HOW MUCH WATER ARE WE TALKING
20110124073904.000|20110124073904.000|CC1|ABOUT?                          
20110124073904.000|20110124073907.000|CC1|>> IN OUR MODEL, WE HAVE UP TO  
20110124073907.000|20110124073908.000|CC1|10 FEET OF RAIN.                
20110124073908.000|20110124073911.000|CC1|>> OVER HOW LONG?               
20110124073911.000|20110124073914.000|CC1|>> OURS ONLY 24 DAYS.           
20110124073914.000|20110124073918.000|CC1|IN 1861 TO 1862, THE NEWSPAPER  
20110124073918.000|20110124073919.000|CC1|SAID THAT THERE WERE 45 STRAIGHT
20110124073919.000|20110124073924.000|CC1|DAYS OF RAIN IN LOS ANGELES.    
20110124073924.000|20110124073925.000|CC1|WE HAVE ONE RAIN GAUGE RECORD   
20110124073925.000|20110124073929.000|CC1|FROM DOWN NEAR THE MARINA, PLAYA
20110124073929.000|20110124073931.000|CC1|DEL REY THAT HAD 50 INCHES OF   
20110124073931.000|20110124073934.000|CC1|RAIN OVER 45 DAYS               
20110124073934.000|20110124073935.000|CC1|.                               
20110124073935.000|20110124073937.000|CC1|>> IN 1862, IT WAS STATE-WIDE.  
20110124073937.000|20110124073940.000|CC1|NOT JUST HERE, BUT UP NORTH.    
20110124073940.000|20110124073942.000|CC1|>> THAT WAS A STATE-WIDE EVENT. 
20110124073942.000|20110124073944.000|CC1|THE CENTRAL VALLEY AND          
20110124073944.000|20110124073945.000|CC1|SACRAMENTO WERE PARTICULARLY    
20110124073945.000|20110124073946.000|CC1|AFFECTED.                       
20110124073946.000|20110124073948.000|CC1|THE GOVERNOR OF SACRAMENTO HAD  
20110124073948.000|20110124073950.000|CC1|TO TAKE A ROW BOAT TO HIS       
20110124073950.000|20110124073951.000|CC1|INAUGURATION AND THE DAMAGE WAS 
20110124073951.000|20110124073954.000|CC1|SO EXTENSIVE THEY MOVED THE     
20110124073954.000|20110124073957.000|CC1|CAPITAL TO SAN FRANCISCO FOR SIX
20110124073957.000|20110124073957.000|CC1|MONTHS.                         
20110124073957.000|20110124073959.000|CC1|ONE THIRD OF THE TAXABLE LAND IN
20110124073959.000|20110124074003.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA WAS DESTROYED BY THE 
20110124074003.000|20110124074003.000|CC1|WEATHER.                        
20110124074003.000|20110124074005.000|CC1|THE STATE BANK WAS BANKRUPT AND 
20110124074005.000|20110124074007.000|CC1|THE GOVERNOR AND LEGISLATURE    
20110124074007.000|20110124074009.000|CC1|WERE NOT PAID FOR 18 MONTHS     
20110124074009.000|20110124074011.000|CC1|>> 'SHOULD WE WORRY ABOUT IT    
20110124074011.000|20110124074011.000|CC1|NOW?                            
20110124074011.000|20110124074014.000|CC1|IT HAPPENS ONCE EVERY 200 YEARS,
20110124074014.000|20110124074016.000|CC1|WE HAVE OTHER THINGS TO WORRY   
20110124074016.000|20110124074016.000|CC1|ABOUT.                          
20110124074016.000|20110124074018.000|CC1|>> IT'S NOT LIKE MAKING SURE YOU
20110124074018.000|20110124074020.000|CC1|GET FOOD ON THE TABLE TODAY, BUT
20110124074020.000|20110124074022.000|CC1|IT'S AS MUCH OF A RISK TO US AS 
20110124074022.000|20110124074025.000|CC1|THE EARTHQUAKES ARE.            
20110124074025.000|20110124074027.000|CC1|THE REASON TO DO THE STUDY IS   
20110124074027.000|20110124074029.000|CC1|MAKE SURE WHEN WE PLAN FOR WHAT 
20110124074029.000|20110124074030.000|CC1|IT'S LIKE TO HAVE A BIG STORM,  
20110124074030.000|20110124074034.000|CC1|WE ARE PLANNING FOR THE         
20110124074034.000|20110124074035.000|CC1|REALISTIC OUT COME.             
20110124074035.000|20110124074037.000|CC1|THE BIG ISSUE IS THE POTENTIAL  
20110124074037.000|20110124074039.000|CC1|DISRUPTION TO THE ECONOMY.      
20110124074039.000|20110124074040.000|CC1|SORT OF LIKE WHAT WE ARE SEEING 
20110124074040.000|20110124074042.000|CC1|WITH NEW ORLEANS IN KATRINA.    
20110124074042.000|20110124074044.000|CC1|HARD TO GET THE ECONOMY GOING   
20110124074044.000|20110124074044.000|CC1|AGAIN.                          
20110124074044.000|20110124074046.000|CC1|IF WE LOSE ONE THIRD OF THE     
20110124074046.000|20110124074048.000|CC1|TAXABLE LAND THIS TIME, THAT'S A
20110124074048.000|20110124074052.000|CC1|HUGE FINANCIAL HIT TO THE       
20110124074052.000|20110124074053.000|CC1|SYSTEMS.                        
20110124074053.000|20110124074054.000|CC1|THERE IS ALSO THE INDUSTRY      
20110124074054.000|20110124074057.000|CC1|DOESN'T BECOME DISRUPT AND      
20110124074057.000|20110124074057.000|CC1|DESTROYED.                      
20110124074057.000|20110124074101.000|CC1|BACK IN 1862, 200 HEAD OF CATTLE
20110124074101.000|20110124074102.000|CC1|WERE DROWNED.                   
20110124074102.000|20110124074105.000|CC1|IT WIPED OUT THE RANCHING       
20110124074105.000|20110124074106.000|CC1|INDUSTRY AS PEOPLE BUILT        
20110124074106.000|20110124074107.000|CC1|AFTERWARDS, THEY COULDN'T AFFORD
20110124074107.000|20110124074109.000|CC1|TO RESTOCK THE CATTLE AND TURNED
20110124074109.000|20110124074110.000|CC1|TO FARMING.                     
20110124074110.000|20110124074112.000|CC1|WE CHANGED THE NATURE OF        
20110124074112.000|20110124074114.000|CC1|AGRICULTURE WITH THE STORM.     
20110124074114.000|20110124074115.000|CC1|THOSE ARE THE POSSIBILITIES THAT
20110124074115.000|20110124074117.000|CC1|WE NEED TO RECOGNIZE AND BY     
20110124074117.000|20110124074118.000|CC1|PLANNING AND WORKING TOGETHER WE
20110124074118.000|20110124074121.000|CC1|CAN KEEP IT FROM DESTROYING OUR 
20110124074121.000|20110124074122.000|CC1|SOCIAL SYSTEM.                  
20110124074122.000|20110124074124.000|CC1|>> OF COURSE I WOULD ASSUME THE 
20110124074124.000|20110124074125.000|CC1|WATER SUPPLY FOR SOUTHERN       
20110124074125.000|20110124074126.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA IS AT RISK AS WELL.  
20110124074126.000|20110124074127.000|CC1|>> OH, YES.                     
20110124074127.000|20110124074130.000|CC1|MUCH OF THIS AFFECTS THE DELTA  
20110124074130.000|20110124074130.000|CC1|AREA.                           
20110124074130.000|20110124074133.000|CC1|IT'S CLEAR THAT THE LEVEES THAT 
20110124074133.000|20110124074135.000|CC1|PROTECT THE WEATHER THAT GO INTO
20110124074135.000|20110124074138.000|CC1|THE DAY BAY DELTA AND ARE       
20110124074138.000|20110124074139.000|CC1|BROUGHT TO SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA  
20110124074139.000|20110124074141.000|CC1|THROUGH THE AQUA DUCT, BOTH     
20110124074141.000|20110124074143.000|CC1|LEVEES ARE LIKELY TO BREAK AND  
20110124074143.000|20110124074145.000|CC1|WE COULD HAVE FLOODING ACROSS   
20110124074145.000|20110124074148.000|CC1|FOR MONTHS AND EVEN YEARS.      
20110124074148.000|20110124074149.000|CC1|ALSO ALL THAT WATER IS GOING TO 
20110124074149.000|20110124074151.000|CC1|BE COMING IN, HAVING FLOODED    
20110124074151.000|20110124074153.000|CC1|THROUGH THE CENTRAL VALLEY.     
20110124074153.000|20110124074155.000|CC1|IF YOU HAVE DRIVEN UP I-5, THINK
20110124074155.000|20110124074157.000|CC1|OF THE ANIMAL FEED LOTS THAT ARE
20110124074157.000|20110124074202.000|CC1|DISTRICTED THROUGH THE CENTRAL  
20110124074202.000|20110124074202.000|CC1|VALLEY.                         
20110124074202.000|20110124074204.000|CC1|THOSE ARE FOR THE CATTLE.       
20110124074204.000|20110124074206.000|CC1|THEY GET DROWN AND THEY STORE   
20110124074206.000|20110124074208.000|CC1|LOTS OF ANTIBIOTICS AND OTHER   
20110124074208.000|20110124074209.000|CC1|THINGS THAT ARE STORED IN THE   
20110124074209.000|20110124074212.000|CC1|FEED LOTS THAT WASHED INTO THE  
20110124074212.000|20110124074214.000|CC1|WATER SUPPLY AND PROVIDE A      
20110124074214.000|20110124074216.000|CC1|CONTAMINATION ISSUE.            
20110124074216.000|20110124074218.000|CC1|WE HAVE MANY WASTEWATER         
20110124074218.000|20110124074218.000|CC1|TREATMENTS.                     
20110124074218.000|20110124074220.000|CC1|THE CITY WILL BE FLOODED.       
20110124074220.000|20110124074222.000|CC1|THAT'S A KNOWN PROBLEM THAT     
20110124074222.000|20110124074223.000|CC1|CONTAMINATE THE WATER SUPPLY.   
20110124074223.000|20110124074226.000|CC1|IT COULD CAUSE LONG-TERM        
20110124074226.000|20110124074228.000|CC1|DISRUPTION TO THE WATER SUPPLY. 
20110124074228.000|20110124074230.000|CC1|>> SOUNDS OVERWHELMING.         
20110124074230.000|20110124074234.000|CC1|THERE EFFORTS, FOR EXAMPLE, TO  
20110124074234.000|20110124074237.000|CC1|RIP OUT THE PARTS OF THE SYSTEM 
20110124074237.000|20110124074238.000|CC1|AND DEKRON CRETE THE LOS ANGELES
20110124074238.000|20110124074240.000|CC1|RIVER, FOR EXAMPLE.             
20110124074240.000|20110124074242.000|CC1|HOW DOES THAT FIT INTO THE      
20110124074242.000|20110124074243.000|CC1|SCENARIO?                       
20110124074243.000|20110124074244.000|CC1|>> WE JUST EXAMINED WHAT THE    
20110124074244.000|20110124074245.000|CC1|IMPACTS WOULD BE WITH THE SYSTEM
20110124074245.000|20110124074247.000|CC1|AS WE HAVE IT RIGHT NOW.        
20110124074247.000|20110124074249.000|CC1|I THINK THIS NEEDS TO BE        
20110124074249.000|20110124074251.000|CC1|INFORMING THE DECISION.         
20110124074251.000|20110124074253.000|CC1|THERE IS A LOT OF BAD SIDES TO  
20110124074253.000|20110124074256.000|CC1|HAVING CONCRETED FLOOD CONTROL  
20110124074256.000|20110124074257.000|CC1|SYSTEMS WOMEN DON'T GET RECHARGE
20110124074257.000|20110124074259.000|CC1|OF THE GROUND WATER AND IMPACTS 
20110124074259.000|20110124074300.000|CC1|ON THE ECOSYSTEMS.              
20110124074300.000|20110124074303.000|CC1|WE NEED TO BE TAKING THOSE OUT  
20110124074303.000|20110124074305.000|CC1|AGAINST LIFE SAFETY ISSUES.     
20110124074305.000|20110124074308.000|CC1|THERE IS ALSO ARGUMENTS BEING   
20110124074308.000|20110124074309.000|CC1|MADE THAT PERHAPS IN SOME       
20110124074309.000|20110124074312.000|CC1|LOCATIONS YOU CAN DO YOUR FLOOD 
20110124074312.000|20110124074313.000|CC1|CONTROL THROUGH A BETTER        
20110124074313.000|20110124074314.000|CC1|MANAGEMENT OF A FLOODPLAIN.     
20110124074314.000|20110124074317.000|CC1|WE WANT TO PROTECT PEOPLE'S     
20110124074317.000|20110124074318.000|CC1|LIVES AND THINK TWICE ABOUT
